description: Whether you dine indoors, on the bright veranda or in the wine cellar with its barrels and wines produced by the estate, you’ll enjoy cuisine at this family-run restaurant which has gained a reputation in the region for its balance of meat and fish dishes. Excellent service and a pleasant setting in a rustic building surrounded by greenery.
